titles.title: Transportation Infrastructure Improvements on Federal Lands Act of 2011

To amend titles 23 and 49, United States Code, to improve the effectiveness of transportation programs on Federal lands and to provide funding for park roads and parkways and the Paul S. Sarbanes Transit in Parks Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1040-1041)
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
